item.title: OPQ at the Energy Excelerator
item.description: Last week Justin Carland and Philip Johnson participated in the Energy Excelerator's 2014 Seed Week program. Representatives from nine energy-related startups attended an 8 day immersive experience at the Energy Excelerator offices in downtown Honolulu. This week kicked off a year-long process of mentorship to help the startups become viable businesses that create a more positive energy future in Hawaii and across the world. For more details, see Philip Johnson's blog post.
